current_demo_response.note: Demo API key cannot access production shipment data

integration_workflow.step_2: Extract barkod (tracking number) from waybill response
integration_workflow.step_3: Create label using etiket_olustur with the barkod
integration_workflow.step_4: Download label PDF from etiket_url or etiket_pdf
integration_workflow.step_5: Store label PDF in database carrier_label_pdf field
integration_workflow.step_6: Update shipment status and tracking information

database_operations.update_shipment: UPDATE shipments SET carrier_label_pdf = '[BASE64_PDF]', carrier_label_url = '[LABEL_URL]' WHERE carrier_tracking_number = '[BARKOD]'
database_operations.store_tracking: INSERT INTO tracking_events (shipment_id, status, message, created_at) VALUES ([ID], 'label_created', 'Shipping label generated', NOW())

production_requirements.api_key: Production AFS Transport API key required
production_requirements.authentication: Valid x-api-key header with production credentials
production_requirements.waybill_dependency: Label creation requires valid waybill barkod from previous waybill_olustur call
production_requirements.rate_limits: Check AFS Transport documentation for API rate limits
